game.name: 咒影  Curse of the Shadow
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Workshop, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: "Curse of the Shadow" is a BL-themed horror visual novel. Cursed by a "ghost", protagonist Xu finds eerie dark shadows in every photo he takes.Once escaping reality, he’s forced by fate to face fears again.To uncover the curse’s truth, he and two friends embark on a terrifying, unknown journey.
